name: Archers Advance
description:
Platform through traps and defeat the evil spirits to secure yourself a lifetime supply of dragonfruit!

There is an end boss.

This game was created in a week for a private game jam organized by the streamer and game creator MatchaMazeCoding (their next public jam) where every participant continued the story of their predecessor. I am sure that in a few years the others will remember to upload their games on itch as well ;)

Also check out SilentDrumr who made the end boss music for this game!
